mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `user` (user_name, user_mail, pass_word, register_time, `role_id`) VALUES (#{user.userName}, #{user.userMail}, #{user.passWordByMd5}, #{user.registerTime}, #{user.roleId});
mapper.select: SELECT id, user_name AS userName, user_mail AS userMail, pass_word AS passWord, role_id AS roleId, `status` FROM `user` WHERE user_mail = #{userMail};
SELECT id, user_name AS userName, user_mail AS userMail, avatar, gender, birthday, intro FROM `user` WHERE id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE `user` SET update_time = #{userPojo.updateTime}, gender = #{userPojo.gender}, birthday = #{userPojo.birthday}, intro = #{userPojo.intro} WHERE id = #{userPojo.id}
